data.title: Xbox Games developed by Turn 10 Studios
data.meta_description: Compare Xbox scores for all the games developed by Turn 10 Studios. Register now to see yours!
data.text:
Most popular Xbox games â€” Fallout continues to dominate

Our latest gameplay chart of the most popular Xbox games shows that the love for Fallout isn't slowing yet, as Fallout 4 and 76 break into the top ten.

Posted 4 months ago by Tom West

Forza Motorsport Update 7 adds iconic track and shrinks Xbox file size

Forza Motorsport Update 7, which is now available to download on Xbox and PC, adds another new track to the racer and has numerous fixes and improvements.

Posted 4 months ago by Sean Carey

Forza Motorsport's game-changing Update 6 rolls out on Xbox today

Forza Motorsport Update 6 rolls out to all Xbox players today, bringing a big overhaul to car progression, numerous game improvements, and more.

Posted 5 months ago by Sean Carey

Forza Motorsport's "divisive" car progression system to be revamped in Update 6

Turn 10 has now revealed what changes it plans to implement to Forza Motorsport's car progression mechanic, which will be rolled out in an Xbox update in March.

Posted 6 months ago by Sean Carey
